channel.title: Old model id for the king black dragon please!
channel.description: Anyone got the old model id for the king black dragon?

item.title: Old model id for the king black dragon please!
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“Moparrsplaya, post:5, topic:148193”]Use the old moparscape 3.2 client to find it.[/quote]You’re an idiot. Those list object/npc/item IDs, not model numbers. And I’m pretty sure the model id for the KBD and other creatures isn’t just one, it’s many. JaGeX split it apart after 400+ to create better movement of the models ingame. Use Betski’s Model Viewer (found on Rune-Server) and use Silab’s Model Grabber (found on Rune-Serv). Combined, you can figure out the models needed.

And Moparrsplaya, you go on help topics and you either flame, or provide false information. Please go learn before you post again.

Read full topic
item.source: Old model id for the king black dragon please!
